actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of July 30, 1965 (79 Stat. 426), which authorized establishment of the Golden Spike National Historic Site, to increase the appropriation authorization ceiling relating to that site.

summary.text: Increases the appropriation authorization ceiling for the Golden Spike National Historic Site from $1,168,000 to $5,422,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of July 30, 1965 (79 Stat. 426), which authorized establishment of the Golden Spike National Historic Site, to increase the appropriation authorization ceiling relating to that site.
